function.name: snmpwalk
function.description: Return all objects under the specified object id.

function.name: snmprealwalk
function.description: Return all objects including their respective object id withing the specified one.

function.name: snmp_set_quick_print
function.description: Return all objects including their respective object id withing the specified one.

function.name: snmpwalkoid
function.description: Return all objects including their respective object id withing the specified one.

function.name: snmp_get_quick_print
function.description: Return the current status of quick_print.

function.name: snmpset
function.description: Set the value of a SNMP object.

function.name: snmp_set_valueretrieval
function.description: Specify the method how the SNMP values will be returned.

function.name: snmp_read_mib
function.description: Reads and parses a MIB file into the active MIB tree.

function.name: snmp_get_valueretrieval
function.description: Return the method how the SNMP values will be returned.
